content: Hose HIT-VL 11/1.0 ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Accessories for fasteners > Injectable mortar accessories- ### FEATURES:Features The use of piston plug and extension hose help to ensure the mortar injected into the drilled hole is consistent and free of air voids Allows more accurate injection of estimated chemical volume, minimizing wastage Applications Injecting Hilti HIT injectable mortal in a variety of conditions, including deep holes, overhead holes and underwater ### TECHNICAL DATA: Plug Diameter: 12 - 35 mm Technical Data | Plug Diameter | 12 - 35 mm ### ITEMS- 2042533 - Hose HIT-VL 11/1.0 - Package Size 10 pc Package Contents: - 1x HIT-VL 11/1.0 Extension hose
